🧜‍♀️【Height Adjustable & Rocking Function】Adjustable 16 degrees tilt angle via the black round knob under the seat. This desk chair can provide 4.72'' adjustable seat range. Chair's total height is 30.9-35.62", to adapt to various heights.

🧜‍♀️【High-quality Material】This vanity chair are made of excellent faux leather, original sponge and metal. Chairs with double wheels and stable 5 star base are strong. The lacquer on the surface newly upgraded, makes the lounge chair scratch resistant.

🧜‍♀️【Chair Size&Load Capacity】Seat Height: 17.71-22.44", Seat Width: 12.99", Seat Depth: 16.92"; Back Width: 18.11", Back Height: 14.17"; Total Height: 31.88-36.61",Total Width:19.68",Total Depth:19.29"; Recommended maximum load is 300LBS.
📩【Attention&Service】Free replacement of damaged parts within 1 year. If any issues, please feel free to contact us, our professional after-sales service will reply to you within 12 hrs ASAP.

Super easy to install and clean. The visible high quality goes without saying.

How long does it take to assemble? So easy! Only 4 screws are needed in total. Assembly generally only takes 7 minutes, also for women, and it is quite stable! Are the chairs easy to clean? If a chair is accidentally stained, simply wipe it with a dampened cloth. Is there anything need to pay attention to? Yes, just please remove the plastic gas cap of cylinder before assembly. Can it support my 260 LBS body? Sure! Our office desk chair can hold up to 300 LBS, 260 LBS are completely safe to use, and it can swivel 360 degrees and adjust higher or lower freely! What if I have a problem with the chair? Any issues, please feel free to contact through your order page or from the seller detail page then clicking on the seller's name section of the product page. We will help you in 12hrs ASAP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern design. Good quality
reviews.reviewText: We got 2 chairs for a meeting nook in a small office. Simple but elegant design, and so many colors to chose from! Pretty firm but comfortable, with good lumbar support. Easy to clean. Not bulky - work great in our small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Office Chair!
reviews.reviewText: Really great office chair, the reclining function is nice to kick your feet back and relax. Super easy to put together, instructions are very clear. Seat is very cushy and the leather is of a nice quality. I've been using it for a few months now and I've had no issues with it. Quiet, no squeaking, not worried about it toppling, unlike some of my past chairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS CHAIR
reviews.reviewText: So, I almost gave up looking for a good desk chair. But then, bam! I found this black desk chair and, let me tell you, it's awesome. It fits right in with my black and wood desk and my black walls. Plus, it looks super cool.The chair is really sleek and has this modern vibe that I love. The black color is just right – not too dull, not too shiny. It looks professional but also kinda edgy, which is exactly my style.It's not just about looks, though. This chair is comfy! I can sit in it for hours and not get that weird backache. And you can adjust it to fit just right, which is a huge plus. Oh yea since it has a curved end and not a 90 degree angle in the middle of the chair I can slouch a little without feeling lazy or making my back hurt which I love after sitting at my desk fkr a couple hours or just watching Netflix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and stylish
reviews.reviewText: I love this comfortable and stylish chair! It fits perfect in my little office nook in my kitchen. The chair has a modern look with beautiful stitching and it was easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great chair for a small office
reviews.reviewText: I am a therapist in a small office. I have a seating area and a desk area so I needed a desk chair that will be not too bulky and wouldn’t take too much space. Since I also conduct virtual sessions I sit at me desk sometimes for a few hours so the chair needed to also be comfortable. This chair fits the bill. It is pretty small but still feels cushioned enough and my back feels fine after seating for a full hour. It feels sturdy and will last a while. Overall a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great chair!
reviews.reviewText: We needed something for my daughter’s desk that didn’t have arms getting in the way. This was the perfect fit! Not only is it quite comfortable, it was also easy to assemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Desk Chair
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 35 of these chairs for a small hotel in Arizona. The chairs are holding up to guest use and look great! The chair is comfortable, and the wheels roll effortlessly. I will be purchasing another 50 or so chairs for another hotel. I have in Colorado.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I love how this green color matches my desk. I also love that it is armless for tucking under my desk as well. The padding is great and I can sit in it for hours without discomfort. The swivel and heigh adjustment works as expected. The faux leather is super easy to clean and I imagine it'll last a very long time and look beautiful for many years.

I am so happy with the chair! It is way comfortable and it looks good as well! I was worried whether I would be able to put it together and I’m shall we say mature ahem, but I was! The directions were plenty clear and it was easy enough to put together. I am using it as an office chair and I enjoy the way it looks. My only problem is I am short and my feet don’t get all the way to the floor even on the lowest setting. But I am kind of used to that when do they? 😆☺️ I would as people have said before me buy this chair. You might just like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Replaced by vendor when first set went missing
reviews.reviewText: I was given these chairs to review. My original Amazon Vine order was lost in transit, but the seller kindly replaced them. I already have some bar stools from this brand, so I was anticipating that the seats would be well-padded and comfortable. I was not disappointed.These are very, very easy to assemble. Each chair requires just 5 bolts (though you get extras) to connect the legs and attach them to the seats, and the Allen key to tighten them is included. In fact, the fixings for each chair are separately packaged in blister packs with the bolts sorted by size, so everything is really clearly laid out for you.The chair legs don’t join as I’d expected - each set comes as two arches, which connect together to form an X-shaped frame, which is then attached to the underside of the chair. I assume that this crossed frame design gives better strength than parallel legs. The pictorial instructions are clearly laid out and straightforward to follow - though I did invert the crossed table legs to join them together, finding this easier than attaching the bolt from the bottom up as depicted. Everything came well-packaged, with the seats wrapped in plastic bags, and the metal legs wrapped in protective foam.The faux leather seats are quite smart-looking, and the diamond pattern is well-padded. If I’d been buying these, rather than receiving them as a review item, as a matter of personal preference (and because the flooring in my craft room, where I’m using these is white) I would probably have opted for the white version rather than the grey, but I don’t mind this colour though it does seem a bit darker in real life than in the main product images. There was a bit of a chemically smell from the seats when I first got them out of the packaging, but this didn’t linger. The metal legs are black with a matte finish.Height-wise, these work well for me (I’m 5’5”), but when my Mum (who is 5’2”) sits back on them her feet don’t touch the floor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Lovely sturdy chairs look lovely with my white table
This is the perfect office desk chair, not too big or bulky but very sturdy. It was so simple to put together with simple to follow instructions. I am very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently ordered the Grey Dining Chairs Set of 2 and I'm absolutely thrilled with them. Assembling the chairs was a breeze and took me no time at all. The hollow metal legs do make a slight rattling sound when moved, but it's not a big deal to me.What really stands out about these chairs is how comfortable they are. The grey upholstery is extremely soft and well-padded, making it a pleasure to sit in these chairs for extended periods of time. They add a touch of sophistication to my dining room, while still being practical and comfortable for everyday use.Overall, I'm very happy with my order and would highly recommend these chairs to anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable seating option for their home.
